product_name: NRS Super Stretch Neoprene Cockpit Cover
long_description: Use the NRS Super Stretch Neoprene cockpit cover to protect your investment and keep debris out of the cockpit. Neoprene cover will provide protection from the weather and can be stowed in the smallest of places. 1.5mm neoprene material sheds water and resists impacts. NRS Super Stretch Neoprene cockpit cover features an adjustable shockcord to snugly fit cockpit coaming. Universal: 28 - 40 in.; Universal Plus: 40 - 57 in. (length of cockpit measured from bow coaming to stern coaming).
short_description: Use the NRS Super Stretch Neoprene cockpit cover to protect your investment and keep debris out of the cockpit.
